name: Dual Saviours
description:
Dual Saviours is a short game made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 conducted by Game Dev London. This is a split screen game where you simultaneosly control two characters. You can either play along with a friend or challenge yourself with dual vision.

Plot:

The planet of KRWOC has been self destructing for over a century. Almost all life forms have been dead. Only the king and queen remains. Every tree is uprooted and only the mother trees are hanging for their deer life in the planet.

Help them save the planet by reviving the two mother trees on each poles of the planet. Keep away from the poisonous rocks on the way. Embrace love and save the dying planet.

Credits:

A-M Classical tracks - moonlight sonata bgm
